upcoming.title: HTML Day 2025
upcoming.description: ​In celebration of HTML day, join us in the park for a HTML Freewrite - [an event] in which people get together and write HTML documents.

upcoming.title: Your Workshop?
upcoming.description: Let us know if you have a workshop you'd like to host.

past.title: Digital Poetics #1
past.description: ​a casual and collaborative evening of creativity, experimentation, and sharing! Whether you're into coding, design, writing, or just love exploring digital art, this is a space to play, build, and connect with like-minded folks.
